item.description: rysnc cif to local ~/.bin/rysnc_cifs.sh #!/bin/bash sudo umount -f /mnt/cifs/* ||true sudo mount /mnt/cifs/vipdoc if test $? -eq 0; then #sucessfull mount echo "mounted /mnt/cifs/vipdoc" echo "rsync /mnt/cifs/vipdoc to /backup/tdx" rsync -az /mnt/cifs/vipdoc /backup/tdx echo "umount vipdoc" sudo umount /mnt/cifs/vipdoc fi sudo mount /mnt/cifs/hq_cache if test $? -eq 0; then # sucessfull mount echo "mounted /mnt/cifs/hq_cache" echo "rysnc /mnt/cifs/hq_cache to /backup/tdx" rsync -az /mnt/cifs/hq_cache /backup/tdx echo "umount hq_cache" sudo umount

item.title: Wifi-Bridge
item.description: Description The device(Mac mini) has a wired(eth0) interface and a wifi(wlan0) interface; eth0 connected to lan with a static ip address, whilewlan0 is used as an access point(ap); Wireless device, such as iphone will connected to lan through wlan0 by access the ap Package prepare Notice: Be sure to set use=‘ap …’ emerge -avq net-wireless/wpa_supplicant emerge -avq net-misc/bridge-utils Configuration /etc/conf.d/net # The bridge will take the ip address, so the individual interfaces don't need any config_eth0="null" config_wlan0="null" modules_wlan0="wpa_supplicant" wpa_supplicant_wlan0="-b br0 -Dnl80211 -d -f /var/log/wpa_supplicant.

item.description: Bokeh Bokeh Server for Nginx bokeh serve --allow-websocket-origin=192.168.0.202:8080 a_directory If add –show will start a local default browser. Above 192.168.0.202:8080 is the nginx serice port. a_directory must have a file named: main.py Nginx /etc/nginx/nginx.conf server { listen 192.168.0.202:8080; server_name gentoo; access_log /tmp/bokeh.access.log; error_log /tmp/bokeh.error.log debug; location / { proxy_pass http://127.0.0.1:5006; proxy_set_header Upgrade $http_upgrade; proxy_set_header Connection "upgrade"; proxy_http_version 1.1; proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for; proxy_set_header Host $host:$server_port; proxy_buffering off; } }
